legal_basis: s. 242(3.1)(a) of the Canada Labour Code
decision_reasoning: adjudicator lacked jurisdiction as employer acted in good faith
cause_of_action: employees laid off due to perceived financial constraints and reorganization of office functions
procedure_followed: judicial review of adjudicator's decision based on jurisdictional issues under the Canada Labour Code
result_of_case: adjudicator's decision was quashed, case dismissed due to lack of jurisdiction
